Recap: Dusty decides to be a silent partner in Rose's shop. They share a few kisses and Dusty tells Rose that HE is the man she's been waiting for all of her life. Dusty calls Barbara and tells her that Rose and Paul are over & to get his money ready. Later, Paul goes to Jack to find dirt on Dusty. With encouragement from Chris, Alison decides to get a job at the hospital. Susan initially doesn't like the idea, but after a talk with Dr. Decker, she changes her mind. Carly takes lunch to Jack at the station where she asks Jack not to arrest Craig until after the fashion show. When Craig calls her, she informs Jack that Craig will be home after the show. At Fairwinds, Craig "apologizes" for leaving Rosanna on her wedding night. Rosanna gets mad at him for turning the tables and asks him to leave. Craig tells her that he hadn't looked at another woman since he left town when Sierra walks in the room. Lucy and Aaron decided not to hide from Craig this time. After she is ordered to pay $3,000 in fines and do community service, Bonnie apologizes to Margo for lying to her about the night Jessica got shot.
